Description:
Roles & ResponsiblilitiesTo design & cost Integrated Security System, in accordance with relevant project specifications, statutes and codes and to do so in accordance with industry best practice and the Group Quality Assurance Systems.
To be responsible and accountable for the proposed integrated technical solutions design across various subsystem solutions.
Support the Design Team Lead in understanding the technical risks, dependencies and issues that exist and be able to quantify these and the impact that they may have on the project in a concise legible reporting format.
Ensure that all project specifications are implemented in the technical solution and are compatible with the project's overall architecture including structured cabling and OSP. Identify any and all compliance issues with recommended resolution options.
Meet and discuss with client, end users and other stakeholders, on the Integrated Security System and associated networking infrastructure for the project design.
Develop professional relationships with the client by demonstrating an understanding of their business and their technology requirements and achieving reliable, timely and high-quality delivery.
Production of Construction and O&M documentation.
Carry out any reasonable request relating to job scope.
Act as the specialist security system technical liaison with the implementation team, this position is based at the head office offices with visits to the job site location to support the role and tasks. Also support other disciplines of the project in various project office locations.
Produce high level and detailed design technical documentation, including CAD drawing review and development, including construction documentation.Skills
Skills: Design Engineer with minimum 5 years of experience and capabilities for designing medium to large integrated security systems projects independently

Hands on experience & good knowledge of all the following systems & technologies: Enterprise Access Control, Enterprise Fire Alarm System, CCTV, IP video, configuration Switches and Routers.
Bachelor of information technology with minimum 5 years of experience strictly as stipulated below;
Must have worked for a reputed system integrator as a Site & Commissioning Engineer for at least 3 years on medium to large projects involving all the above mentioned systems & technologies.
Must have worked for a reputed system integrator as a Design Engineer for at least 2 years on medium to large projects involving all the above mentioned systems & technologies.
Must have worked on major American and European brands involving all the above mentioned systems & technologies.
Good working knowledge of and interest in all areas of Security Design and Requirements.
Good knowledge of technical infrastructure and integration technologies to include power, UPS, networking, communications.
Network experience to include WAN, LAN, firewall, network switch technologies and video transmission on IP networks.
Experience of design and implementation of large scale integrated security systems and complex projects.
Ability to quickly develop professional and trusted relationships with a variety of cultures and clients.
Proficient in MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint MS Project.
CCNA routing & switching (Cisco certified)
CCNP Enterprise 350-401 ENCOR
